#summary *How to install* instruction

= Introduction =

How to Install the extension on LibreOffice or OpenOffice installation.

= Details =

 # Go to _Tools -> Extension Manager_ <br>
 # Click on *Add...* <br>
 # Select *queryconnector.oxt* <br>
 # Accept the prompted license <br>
 # Enjoy! :D
